blog.name: luvr4fantanim
blog.title: Musings of little ol'me
blog.description: Be the chaos you want to see in the world -Mollymauk Tealeaf :) 24 year old from Mexico. Slowly dying Astro grad student. Full time Slytherin. ENFP. DnD. Critical Role. Fluent in Spanglish. Stress writer. Adores books, stories and dancing. May or may not be a fangirl in disguise. Keep away from her food. Curses at least once in every fucking paragraph. Ideal job: professional stargazer.

tags: JUST GIVE ME ALL THE FICS LIKE THIS
like one of my friends said
all my baes will be resurrected... someday
summary: The Blood Hunter - Chapter 4 - luvr4fantanim - Critical Role (Web Series) [Archive of Our Own]
title: The Blood Hunter - Chapter 4 - luvr4fantanim - Critical Role (Web Series) [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Summary:

Where is he? Who is he? Why is he here?

Mollymauk Tealeaf experiences limbo.

Notes:

Ahhhh this is the last chapter of my short fanfic! I might write some more in this universe about my headcannons about Molly’s past and etc. I also think I’ll write a little epilogue and post it separately.

In any case, I’m glad I managed to post this story as a whole! We all miss Molly and sometimes we need fix-it fics to pick us all up.

Enjoy!

summary: I can’t help but wonder what would have happened if Molly had survived their encounter with the Iron Shepherds. The Tomb Takers...
body:
I can’t help but wonder what would have happened if Molly had survived their encounter with the Iron Shepherds. The Tomb Takers acted out of Shady Creek Run. Would he have been recognized? Would people have come after him? Worshipped him? Who even was Lucien?

Honestly I’m still holding onto hope that we’ll learn more some day. Even if Molly doesn’t come back, it would be so unsatisfying to just leave his story hanging like that!

trail.content:
I can’t help but wonder what would have happened if Molly had survived their encounter with the Iron Shepherds. The Tomb Takers acted out of Shady Creek Run. Would he have been recognized? Would people have come after him? Worshipped him? Who even was Lucien?

Honestly I’m still holding onto hope that we’ll learn more some day. Even if Molly doesn’t come back, it would be so unsatisfying to just leave his story hanging like that!

summary: Had to pause episode one for a bit for some errands. But, I’m loving Jester and would hate her as a customer for that book...
body: Had to pause episode one for a bit for some errands. But, I’m loving Jester and would hate her as a customer for that book store. 😅 I love her. But as a retail worker I’d be so confused and done with my job if I ever turned around and found every display and item turned upside down and moved around.

summary: M9 as the Sailor Scouts or quotes from the Show Sailor Moon.
question: M9 as the Sailor Scouts or quotes from the Show Sailor Moon.
answer:
@onegirlintheback : send me different ways to sort the m9!!!!!

oh this is such a good one! thank you so much for sending this one in. i’m gonna do characters + why i think they fit; also going off sailor moon crystal as it’s what i’m most familiar with!

fjord: hotaru tomoe / sailor saturn - something weird is going on and has no idea what it is. never really had the chance to be a real kid and forced to grow up early.

beau: minako aino / sailor venus - has been doing shit longer than the others, kinda. hella athletic and can just destroy you. street smart. does badly in school and other structured programs, though mostly because she doesn’t want to put the effort into it.

yasha: rei hino / sailor mars - she is the quiet, reserved one of the group who works in mysterious ways that is really only clear to her but still a team player.

mollymauk: haruka tenou / sailor uranus - what is traditional gender rolesTM + can be a shameless flirt. always seems the least affected by whatever life throws at them.

caleb: ami mizuno / sailor mercury - a never-ending fountain of knowledge and an ever-burning desire to keep learning. feels deeply, way more than anyone probably realizes.

nott: luna - mom friendTM and fiercely protective of her charge, supportive but also not a pushover and willing to push caleb when he needs it.

jester: usagi small lady serenity / sailor chibi moon - it’s hard not to love or either be completely annoyed at. inexperienced and naive, but not for lack of trying. has a weird invisible friend they talk to constantly. would be terrified to see her dark side.

caduceus: setsuna meiou / sailor pluto - mysterious. tall babe with a staff. cares for and protects a graveyard all by themselves. not nearly enough screentime.

keg: mamoru chiba / tuxedo mask - wears glasses and is very cute in them. brash and distant, but nice deep down. deep down. wants to open up to people more but doesn’t know how. 

shakäste: michiru kaiou / sailor neptune - too cool for you. a god ??? has seen some shit and continues to see too much than any one human should.

calianna: usagi tsukino / sailor moon - doing her best and an absolute angel, if a little spacy at times. sweetheart, but don’t force her to throw hands because she will fuck you up. on a mission to defeat evil.

nila: makoto kino / sailor Jupiter - loves love and ready to throw down for it. tall as a damn tree. simultaneously sweet and naive while also being incredibly wise.

kiri: neo-queen serenity - everyone would die for her without hesitation.

m9 as troubled birds

summary: lol both matt and liam didnt know what they were talking about. cats can survive a 6 story fall yea. but with like. massive...
body: lol both matt and liam didnt know what they were talking about. cats can survive a 6 story fall yea. but with like. massive injuries. 1/3 of cats would need immediate medical attention or would die from their injuries. survivable =/= unscathed

blog.name: aceavengers
blog.title: i like food and comfy sweaters
blog.description: my name is shelley, i'm a 25 year old white, cis college grad.  I use she/her pronouns. I'm biromantic asexual.  I've been diagnosed with anxiety disorder and self dx ADHD. Intersectional feminist.  Huge fangirl of everything.

summary: I can’t believe I’m diving back into this discourse again but it really irks me when people say that Matt should have found a...
body:
I can’t believe I’m diving back into this discourse again but it really irks me when people say that Matt should have found a way to not kill Molly but similarly back in the merrow fight in the cave people were bashing Matt for making the merrow run away instead of using thunderwave right next to Caleb and trying to kill him.  The way that played out happened pretty naturally and Matt gave Molly and Beau a few chances not to fuck up but things ended up fucked up anyway.

Also when people say Matt doesn’t care about his friends because if he did he would have made Molly live after seeing how upset Taliesin was.  First of all Tal was upset for a hot minute and now he seems fine.  Secondly if Tal asked Matt, I’m sure they would have come up with a way to get Molly back but Tal preferred to make a new character.  THIRD, these guys have been close friends for like a dozen years stop acting as if you know Taliesin better than his own fucking friends.

Finally in order for this to count as a bury your gays type of trope the death would have to be scripted.  Dice rolls are random.  Matt didn’t set out with the goal of killing one of his players.  Molly died due to his own actions.  People just really need to get over themselves.

reblog.comment:
I can’t believe I’m diving back into this discourse again but it really irks me when people say that Matt should have found a way to not kill Molly but similarly back in the merrow fight in the cave people were bashing Matt for making the merrow run away instead of using thunderwave right next to Caleb and trying to kill him.  The way that played out happened pretty naturally and Matt gave Molly and Beau a few chances not to fuck up but things ended up fucked up anyway.

Also when people say Matt doesn’t care about his friends because if he did he would have made Molly live after seeing how upset Taliesin was.  First of all Tal was upset for a hot minute and now he seems fine.  Secondly if Tal asked Matt, I’m sure they would have come up with a way to get Molly back but Tal preferred to make a new character.  THIRD, these guys have been close friends for like a dozen years stop acting as if you know Taliesin better than his own fucking friends.

Finally in order for this to count as a bury your gays type of trope the death would have to be scripted.  Dice rolls are random.  Matt didn’t set out with the goal of killing one of his players.  Molly died due to his own actions.  People just really need to get over themselves.

Also when people say Matt doesn’t care about his friends because if he did he would have made Molly live after seeing how upset Taliesin was.  First of all Tal was upset for a hot minute and now he seems fine.  Secondly if Tal asked Matt, I’m sure they would have come up with a way to get Molly back but Tal preferred to make a new character.  THIRD, these guys have been close friends for like a dozen years stop acting as if you know Taliesin better than his own fucking friends.

Finally in order for this to count as a bury your gays type of trope the death would have to be scripted.  Dice rolls are random.  Matt didn’t set out with the goal of killing one of his players.  Molly died due to his own actions.  People just really need to get over themselves.
trail.content:
I can’t believe I’m diving back into this discourse again but it really irks me when people say that Matt should have found a way to not kill Molly but similarly back in the merrow fight in the cave people were bashing Matt for making the merrow run away instead of using thunderwave right next to Caleb and trying to kill him.  The way that played out happened pretty naturally and Matt gave Molly and Beau a few chances not to fuck up but things ended up fucked up anyway.

Also when people say Matt doesn’t care about his friends because if he did he would have made Molly live after seeing how upset Taliesin was.  First of all Tal was upset for a hot minute and now he seems fine.  Secondly if Tal asked Matt, I’m sure they would have come up with a way to get Molly back but Tal preferred to make a new character.  THIRD, these guys have been close friends for like a dozen years stop acting as if you know Taliesin better than his own fucking friends.

summary: This is a long shot, but I was at work today and met a Critter in the wild who was pretty cool and I kinda regret not, like,...
body:
This is a long shot, but I was at work today and met a Critter in the wild who was pretty cool and I kinda regret not, like, getting your name or social media info.

So whoever was at a certain craft store that rhymes with Blichaels and was getting supplies for making OOAK dolls and whose birthday was on the day Molly died
